name: SkyJet Fighters
description:
Join an epic battle of warplanes and jet fighters to destroy the enemy warplanes with real bomber weapons. Become an airplane pilot and fly high in the sky. Join an ultimate dogfight mission, an air to air combat battle. The enemies around you have got a strong military base with bomber aircraft, battlefield ships, and dangerous bomber warplanes. Your country was the one who dominated the skies during world war II battlefield. Use your flying maneuvers skills to fly aircraft around the world and win the war on the battlefield. Perform maneuvers stunts with an awesome 3D flying plane simulator. Sky Jet Fighters is an action-packed fly plane simulator game. Experience the most realistic airplane games with exciting missions and thrilling adventures. Fly above the battleground with the best plane pilot simulator of the year. Select your own 3D aircraft and get ready for the air jet plane simulator game. Feel the power by killing your enemies from World War II. Take off from the city base headquarter airport. Become a pilot. Relive the greatest battles of WWII in Sky Jet Fighters – An ultimate flying simulator game. Command the Airforce fleet to fight the allied forces. With the best strategy & tactics, shoot down the enemy fighter jets. An ultimate action-packed adventure air fight war games with the best flight simulator 3D!

The story is about lieutenant Col Maurice Ferrell who was fighting in World War II as a brave fighter pilot commander of bomber aircraft. After gunning down 6 flying fighter planes, the lieutenant was heading back to his base when his aerobatic plane was hit and crashed, killing the Maurice Ferrell. It’s been 40 years now since the World War II, Col Maurice Ferrell’s son Clayton Ferrell continued his father’s legacy by joining the U.S Marine Armed Forces to investigate his father’s death. He has been deployed in the same area to attack the enemies & take down their defense line by destroying their submarines, weapons supply truck & anti-aircraft guns. The terrors of ww2 still prevail in this dark night as Clayton fights for his dad to bring justice. Get inside the acrobatic airplane cockpit of a bomber fighter jet and take controls over the real enemy. Without any passengers, you can perform dangerous twists turns and maneuver stunts. An ultimate 3D flight simulator! Only the brave hearts can enter the cockpit for adventurous missions or they may faint.

Its the best flight simulator game for you if you love to play acrobatic airplane games & flying adventure games.


Sky Jet Fighters Features:

- Stunning 3D graphics
- Real world war missions
- Take off and landing from airport
- Action-packed combat flight game
- Jets used: F15, F18 Hornet and MIG 29
- Amazing world war scenarios and terrain
- An amazing warzone fighter jet flight simulator
- Realistic dogfight simulation between WWII planes
- First person shooting (fps) as well as third-person shooting game

You can play this game without wifi & it's a ​100% offline game. This Plane Fighting Game is FREE & FUN, So Download NOW!
